description: The US president played up his role in resolving the conflict between Israel and the Islamic Republic. On the ground, explosions were heard in Tehran and Iranian missiles killed at least four people in Beersheba.

description: The new French number one is taking part in the qualifying rounds of the London Grand Slam tournament. She has several qualities that will help her on grass,  beginning with her powerful serve.

headline: A different perspective on erotic cinema
description: A French festival dedicated to erotic film is holding its 10th edition until June 29 in several cinemas across the Paris region.

description: The bombing of Iran's main nuclear sites by the US marks the triumph of Israel, which in just a few months has become the sheriff of the Middle East, writes Le Monde columnist Gilles Paris.

headline: 'Jaws' turns 50: A foundational film that changed cinema
description: The incredible success of Steven Spielberg's film, released simultaneously across the US at the very start of summer 1975, was the result of a wild gamble by Universal that revolutionized Hollywood, writes Le Monde's Michel Guerrin in his column.

headline: The Heritage Foundation sets its sights on Europe
description: Since the beginning of his term, Donald Trump has been applying Project 2025, a 922-page bible written by the conservative think tank. Today, its president, Kevin Roberts, is looking across the Atlantic. On a visit to France, he met with leaders of far-right parties.
